abstract: Grupo Santander will sell 35 percent stake in its automotive financing unit in United States to group of private equity investors for $1.15 billion; investors include Kohlberg Kravis Roberts and Warburg Pincus.
snippet: Grupo Santander announced a $1.15 billion deal on Friday to sell a 35 percent stake in its automotive financing unit in the United States to a group of private equity investors.
lead_paragraph: Grupo Santander announced a $1.15 billion deal on Friday to sell a 35 percent stake in its automotive financing unit in the United States to a group of private equity investors.

headline.main: Santander to Sell Stake in U.S. Auto Financing Group
headline.print_headline: Santander to Sell Stake in U.S. Auto Financing Group
